text: @GeorgeTakei Maybe this folks that will not wear a mask understand that their faith is stronger than any virus and God His Eye Is on the Sparrow and it is certainly on us and he is well able to keep us from Contracting Coronavirus. You call me fragile I would love to beat you down.
